name: OtanersatierF Software
short_description:
This is the installer of all applications created by Renato Alexandre Santos Freitas

The following applications can be found in the package:
· Easiest Calendar Creator
· Numerical Systems Calculator
· Numerical Systems Converter
· Price Tag Details
· Date Difference Calculator
· Testing Arithmetic Knowledge
· Current Time Designator
· Week Days Finder
· Triangles Rectangles Solver
· Advanced Trigonometry Calculator
· Advanced Exponentials Informer
· Advanced Roots Informer
· Advanced Exponentials Calculator
· Advanced Roots Calculator
· Advanced Arithmetic Calculator
· Arithmetic Matrix Calculator
· Square Numbers Informer
· Simple Text Codifier and Decodifier
· Prime Numbers Informer
